author: esm
msg: [PLUTO-347]:  If Pluto 1.1.x is being run under JDK 1.5+, give the option of using JAXP.  Added system property org.apache.pluto.useJaxp with a default value of false, to maintain JDK 1.4/Pluto 1.1.x compatability.

When true, Castor is instructed to use JAXP instead of the parser defined by org.exolab.castor.parser.  The reason this is hard-coded versus using a castor.properties file is because the castor.properties file would go into a shared classloader which may adversely affect other applications that rely on Castor (for an example see PLUTO-329).

author: esm
msg: [PLUTO-347]: Remove dependency on shared/lib xerces and xmlAPIs.  Added system property org.apache.pluto.useJaxp with a default value of true.  When true, Castor is instructed to use JAXP instead of the parser defined by org.exolab.castor.parser.  The reason this is hard-coded versus using a castor.properties file is because the castor.properties file would go into a shared classloader which may adversely affect other applications that rely on Castor (for an example see PLUTO-329).

author: proyal
msg: JEXL-13 - Allow pluggable Uberspect by supplying one when creating a non-static instance of the ExpressionFactory. The static instance still uses the default Uberspect.
